name: Accelar
description: Accelar is a unified product development infrastructure that allows for efficient development, launching, and management of web3 features. Create canisters, workflows, identities, and interact with dApps through a non-custodial wallet.

name: RentSpace
description: A property rental platform powered by blockchain technology and Web3 innovation. RentSpace enables tenants to pay fees and rent in either cryptocurrency or traditional money. It will have an integrated actions-based rewards system.

name: VirtuaSeal
description: VirtuaSeal is an application that will allow users to submit information to and sign documents leveraging a smart contract on the blockchain. Users can create documents from a template or from scratch, verify the robustness and authenticity of the document using hashes, sign documents in a secured manner, and share documents with other parties.
stats: Two law firms have agreed to use this product

name: {r}elinkd
description: Digital identity + scores protocol and dapp. We're building a decentralized identity protocol, aggregating on-chain and off-chain credentials into the scores for creating trustworthy self-sovereign identity and personal brand profiles.

name: ArcMind AI
description: ArcMind AI is a LLM-powered autonomous agent running that uses Chain of thoughts for reasoning, taking actions and completing goal. It orchestrates with web agents to interact with the world in real time, and Vector DB for long term memory store.

name: WASI for IC
description: A collection of a tool and libraries that enables projects initially developed to be run on the WASI environment to be executed inside a canister.

name: Game Bloc
description: Game Bloc is a decentralised platform for hosting game tournaments which can either be crowdfunded (individually Funded tournaments) or Prepaid (funded by a gaming company trying to get their app or DApp known or Game Bloc). Rewards and incentives are sent directly to selected winners or squads.
stats:
- We have 344 active users.
- We have 64 created squads.
- We are currently hosting our first prepaid tournament with a pool prize of $400.

name: Jobgrader
description:
Jobgrader brings the Crowdworking market to train AI and any other micro task with over 150 million users into WEB3. All work onchain.
Jobgrader is challenging the need for verified workers to ensure data quality and audit ability without loading privacy in the micro task market. Any AI model must be fine tuned to provide compliant output. Jobgrader adds a global Business Process Outsourcing pipeline for any company with escrow contracts for micro payouts with our THXC token.
stats: So far the Bitfinity Main Net is not yet launched so that we were unable to get into bigger achievements. Looking forward for a next round.

name: aVa Reputation
description: Issue Digital Certificates with aVa Reputation, Anchored in User Activity
stats: All Internet Identity Users

name: OptiGames.pro
description: OptiGames is a flexible framework for fully on-chain multiplayer turn-based games. The proof-of-concept game Bulldog Blast uses the framework for an action arcade experience.

name: Local Icp
description: Local Icp is an On-chain Peer-to-Peer Cryptocurrency Trading Platform which eliminates the use of Centralized Exchanges for buying and selling of ICP as well as other native tokens.

name: FormyFi
description:
Decentralized & fully on-chain forms.
Toolset for conducting surveys in Web3, ensuring security and completeness of data.

name: zkCross Network Decentralised Cross-Chain Swap
description: Our product streamlines cross-chain transactions, enabling swaps and bridges via a decentralised method, eliminating dependence on centralised servers. Utilising threshold ECDSA keys, we ensure private keys are never stored in server environments, boosting security. Additionally, we're integrating Internet Computer Protocol (ICP) to transition our indexers and executors. Transactions proceed only when two-thirds of our canisters confirm, ensuring a secure and reliable process.

name: Secure Guard Escrow
description:
Welcome to SecureGuard Escrow, your trusted partner in making online transactions safe and sound. In a world where buying and selling online can feel like a leap of faith, we're here to ensure that your leap lands you on solid ground.

We provide a secure platform where money for a transaction is safely held until everyone involved is happy with the deal. Whether you're buying a vintage car, selling a piece of art, or closing a deal on a new app development, we've got your back.

name: PADO
description: PADO is a zk-attestation and computation network that breaks down barriers between datasets, enriches smart contract functionalities, and enables secure monetization of personal data within privacy-protected data flows. PADO creates applications and developer toolkits for end users and community builders.  With advanced cryptography techniques like IZK, MPC-TLS and zkFHE, PADO’s core application allows users to manage their personal data, and gain benefits while maintaining privacy.
stats: PADO extension has over 25k registered users and  over 30k zkAttestations created on blockchains.

name: Gotcha AI CAPTCHA
description: CAPTCHAs to distinguish humans and bots on the Internet in the AI era.

name: MyOrdinals.Loan - Borrow and Lend ckBTC for Ordinals
description: MyOrdinals.Loan facilitates peer-to-peer Bitcoin lending using ckBTC, a 1-to-1 mapped cryptocurrency to BTC. Users borrow or lend Bitcoin, securing transactions with unique Ordinal Inscriptions (Ordinals) as collateral. The process is fast and cost-effective, leveraging an Internet Computer Canister for security.
stats: We have successfully implemented the deposit and withdrawal processes for Ordinals, along with the functionality to lend ckBTC.

name: Internet Computer Analytics Platform
description: ICAP is a platform for users to query and analyze data from various sources in the ICP ecosystem. Currently, it comprehends canisters for handling semantic data and a domain ontology called ICOnto that is designed to represent and structure the main conceptual entities of the ecosystem.
stats: We have just delivered Phase 1 of the ICAP project and delivered an extended version of the ICOnto ontology, a backend canister that provides a triplestore implementation, and a frontend canister to allow accessing the knowledge stored in the triplestore using SPARQL.

name: Swimming Pool
description: Fully onchain permissionless stablecoin protocol, collateralizing your BTC, ETH and other crypto assets.

name: Knowledge Token Wallet frontend
description: Our Knowledge Token Wallet enables simple viewing, browsing and sorting of your tokens according to their tags and specific identities, as well as trading them in auctions/transactions.

name: Pluto
description: Pluto is an HTTP router & SSR tool implemented on the Internet Computer to facilitate working with HTTP. This router is a framework that allows you to write REST API applications on the blockchain in almost the same way as in Web 2
stats: +15 stars on github

name: CodeGov
description: Advancing decentralization of the internet computer through NNS Replica Version Management proposal reviews and informed, independent voting by skilled developers in the ICP community

name: BlendSafe
description: BlendSafe is a MultiSignature wallet and omnichain module designed for cross-chain message signing, suitable for multiple blockchain ecosystems.

name: Odoc
description: Documentation app that implements custom smart contracts where the unordinary user can write the smart contract in the form of a table (data grid) without the need to know coding. At odoc, we also have task management and social platforms that combine the work of websites like Jira and Upwork at once.
stats: Still waiting ckUSDT, my website can't really be used without that. Yet, I am publishing it now as documentation website only.

name: Hamster
description: Hamster is the one-stop infrastructure, developer toolkit and middleware DevOps service platform, empowering projects in Web3.0 to improve their coding and delivery speed, quality and efficiency, as well as product reliability & safety.

name: Zoksh
description:
Zoksh is a non-custodial payment solution that enables businesses to accept over 1000 currencies across 17 blockchains. Zoksh supports major OnRamps to enable Fiat payments, along with Fiat settlements directly to the bank accounts.
Our powerful payment gateway offers some of the best tools that make business easy.
Merchants can accept payments from anywhere in the world, incorporating a suite of payment optimization, security, and compliance features that ensure a great checkout experience
stats: Zoksh has hit a monthly volume of over 1M USD in just 8 months of operation demonstrating its rapid growth and market acceptance.

name: ICP Gitcoin Passport Client
description: Through an UI securely retrieve anti-Sybil scoring data from Gitcoin Passport, store it in a DB.
stats: 0 downloads at mops.one

name: SurveyEase
description: SurveyEase empowers users to design, distribute, and analyze surveys effortlessly. With features like dynamic template creation, real-time preview, and intuitive data visualization, users can create tailored surveys that capture valuable insights. Advanced functionalities such as team management, survey sharing, and access control ensure seamless collaboration and security.

name: Local Icp
description: Local Icp is an On-chain Peer-to-Peer Cryptocurrency Trading Platform.

name: Pochi
description: Fully on-chain decentralized Hrms. Save User Data ,Send and receive ckBtc in single or bulk payments. Schedule Payments and much more.

name: B4B
description:
B4B.app is a Web3 influencer marketing protocol that brings transparency, ownership, escrow, and on-chain history from all Socials

✔️Marketplace to book and manage Ad process with high-quality influencers
✔️All-in-one solution: search + analytics + escrow Ad process
✔️Aggregated reputation layer from all social platforms (start with X, TG, Lens…)
✔️Open standards and protocol layer on ICP for reputation, statistics and track record
stats: 400+ verified influencer/KOLs onboarded, 30+ Web3 companies tried the product, 150+ Ad campaigns successfully launched

name: DataPond.AI
description:
DataPond is a hub for exposing and tracing data used by AI to generate results. It enables end users and businesses to store files on Internet Computer and to control how they are consumed by AI tools as input for training, reasoning, or producing answers.
DataPond is available as an open-source toolbox for developers who want to bridge their decentralized applications with AI transparently and efficiently.
stats: Identity integration and on-chain data storage with open-source canisters.

name: Cubetopia
description: Welcome to Cubetopia, a vibrant on-chain sandbox where adventure and creativity meet! Connect with friends to explore diverse worlds, or unleash your creativity on your very own island. Dive into thrilling minigames and compete for glory, or relax and care for your adorable pets. In Cubetopia, the possibilities are truly limitless.
stats: 1000+ players 10k+ plays

name: AppIC DAO
description: Cross-chain token swapping made possible by AppIC DAO! First-ever infrastructure layer built on ICP that allows users and Dapps to transfer and swap tokens between ICP and different blockchains such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, and EVM chains, completely decentralized.  AppIC DAO offers unique DeFI solutions such as Auto Investment, Multi swapping, Cross-chain swapping, and AI-based portfolio solutions.

name: Orderswap Layer2
description: A Layer2 built on Dfinity

name: ICP-Coffee-App
description: The app allows coffee farmers to submit data reports on their yields and processes for crop insurance purposes.
stats: The app is being field tested by farmers in sub-Saharan Africa.

name: ICPEx
description: ICPEx is a decentralized exchange built entirely on the chain based on the IC protocol, adhering to a user-centric philosophy with the aim of becoming a decentralized financial hub for Web3.
stats:
(1) Users created 229 Tokens on ICPEx
(2) Users created 90+ liquidity pools on ICPEx

name: ICP Canister Bridge
description: A bridge powered by ICP enables seamless swaps between the Lightning Network and EVM-compatible chains. It features a service maintained by the canister owner, including a canister and REST API for interacting with the service's Lightning node, as well as a P2P swap market secured by the canister.

name: Personal DAO
description: Personal DAO is a commoditized application- this means that it can be purchased, own, custody'd, governed and updated without the need for any coding experience nor any intermediaries. Personal DAO currently functions as an ICP neuron stake pool and a community treasury/multi-sig wallet. In the near future, Personal DAO will feature a peer-to-peer lending protocol that supports ICP, staked ICP, Ehtereum, Bitcoin and Stable coins.
stats: 3 DAO-controlled neurons staked, 177 successful upgrades delivered programmatically to 3 different Personal DAO's deployed to the IC(totaling 531 upgrades delivered).

name: NX Governance
description: NX Governance is multi-chain governance framework built on the Internet Computer. Our framework is designed with a focus on modularity, transparency, versatility, and security, ensuring every administrative action is auditable and executed via democratic consensus.

name: Communities.ooo
description: Communities.ooo is a tool that creates online communities owned by the creators as ICRC7 NFTs. Users can join this communities with their Ethereum, Solana or IC wallets. Creators on the other hand have moderation tools to maintain and upgrade their communities.

name: IC Footprint
description: IC Footprint is a blockchain ESG platform that tracks ICP environmental metrics and provides tooling to reduce the environmental impact of the network. The platform enables real-time emissions tracking, energy management based on grid carbon intensity or regional electricity cost, and decarbonisation via an environmental asset exchange.
stats: 1,200+ ESG wallets created, 1,100,000 KgCO2e tracked, 14,000+ KgCO2e compensated

name: Galactic bridge
description: Galactic bridge is a cross-chain bridge that allows users to move Solana to ICP and vice versa. It is based on chain-key cryptography and Solana treasury program. Learn more here: https://weichain.gitbook.io/galactic-bridge.
stats: The first bridge on ICP that supports Solana

name: CBIndex
description: CBIndex transforms crypto asset management by integrating Bitcoin and Bitcoin assets with omnichain capabilities, ensuring secure, trustless, and diversified BTCFi on multiple blockchains. CBIndex leverages the ICP technology to offer a suite of BTCFi products, including Bitcoin bridge, decentralized Bitcoin indexer, Bitcoin cross-chain restaking, Bitcoin lending & borrowing, and Bitcoin token on-chain fund management, across multiple blockchain networks, including Ethereum, Solana, Aptos, etc.

name: B3Forge
description: B3Forge leverages the unique capabilities of the interface definition language(Candid), to revolutionize the creation of user interfaces for decentralized applications (dApps). With B3Forge, developers can effortlessly generate user interfaces without the need to write a single line of code. This innovative approach simplifies the development process, making it accessible to a broader audience and accelerating the adoption of decentralized solutions.

name: Pass
description:
Project Highlights: Pass - Elevating Password Management with Blockchain Technology

Overview: 
Pass redefines password management by integrating cutting-edge Rust code with the power of the Internet Computer blockchain. It offers a seamless and secure solution for users to safeguard their digital identities and streamline their online experience.

Join us on this transformative journey with Pass and experience the next evolution of password management firsthand!

name: TaxLint
description: Decentralised, Private, Secure, Automated Tax Report, TaxLint help users easily count ICP and ICRC1 token transactions
stats: 150 users

name: SCINET
description: SCINET is a licensing application for life-sciences companies. With SCINET, you can easily monetize your intellectual property using NFTs.
stats: We completed our MVP and are ready to onboard users.

name: motoDEX
description: MotoDEX is a top-3 Blockchain Game, in which users participate in motorcycle races, develop their riders and improve high-speed tracks.

name: ChainkeyX
description: A crypto neobank that offers a fully onchain bitcoin borrowing and lending on ICP. The idea is a liquid staking fixed deposit product for long term bitcoin stackers to earn bitcoin denominated yield on our idle bitcoin stash.  The yield is generated by lending these bitcoin to more sophisticated DeFi users who want to leverage up their returns on their bitcoin related liquditiy pool or restaking positions.

name: CLP Finance
description: CLP(Crato Liquidity Protocol) is a decentralized financial protocol built on the Internet Computer Protocol (ICP) ecosystem. By adopting an interest-free lending mechanism, CLP aims to provide users with low-cost, efficient, and secure digital asset lending services. Users can borrow the stablecoin CUSD by pledging ICP, ckETH or ckBTC, achieving liquidity for crypto assets. Utilizing a dual-token mechanism (CUSD and CLPT), users can earn additional rewards through mining and liquidation.
stats: CLP is under development and is expected to launch a beta version in June.

name: Taurus-PROTECT
description: Taurus-PROTECT is a enterprise digital asset custody solution which allows banks to offer custody of any digital assets for their clients and create staking transactions on any supported blockchain

name: BrownFi AMM
description: BrownFi has invented a novel AMM with high capital efficiency and simple UX. By a simulation setting, we show that BrownFi has high CE as Uniswap V3 and hundred-folds higher than Uniswap V2. Additionally, BrownFi offers a simple UX (like Uniswap V2), suitable for both retail and professional LPs. BrownFi AMM aims to unlock deep liquidity and high capital efficiency on ICP, a very new and emerging layer-1 ecosystem.

name: bIPQuantum
description: bIPQuantum deploy AI as an IP assistant and virtual lawyer to revolutionize IP management. Our platform sets the standard for IP tokenization on the Internet Computer Protocol, ensuring secure and efficient IP asset management. Users can create, manage, and trade IP certificates with our AI-driven system, which provides guidance on US Copyright law. Our POC demonstrates the minting of blockchain-based IP certificates, including title, description, type, licenses, price, and ownership details.
stats: We are planning to test and attract 500 creatives, aiming to mint over 1,000 IP tokens. Our goal is to demonstrate the value of our innovative IP management solutions and engage a growing number of users on our platform.

name: ELNA.ai
description:
ELNA.ai secures AI Agents using Blockchain.
A community-driven decentralised AI agent creation platform on the IC blockchain that bridges the gap between the development, creation and monetisation of AI agents on the blockchain - making AI’s governance transparent, and user data secure and private.

name: SNS Rewards Dashboard
description: The product is a data dashboard that displays metrics and charts related to the rewards distributed within the SNS ecosystem. The objective of the dashboard is to educate stakeholders on the potential rewards they could be earning by voting on SNS proposals.

name: Replicatr
description: Nostr relay with Internet Computer integration for inter-relay synchronization.
stats: NA

name: ic-payroll
description: IC-Payroll delivers a powerful, user-friendly, and secure HR management and payroll solution that leverages the unique capabilities of the Internet Computer. By enhancing efficiency, reducing costs, and ensuring data sovereignty, IC-Payroll empowers businesses to manage their HR operations with confidence and ease.
stats: ckbtc integration ,metamask integration for vue

name: Dotmeet
description: Dotmeet aims to assist web3 communities and companies in effectively reaching their target audience within cities by offering a city-based events calendar app. This platform enables users to conveniently view all web3 events within their cities in one centralized location. The app is seamlessly integrated with Telegram web3 communities through Telegram bots, allowing communities to effortlessly list events in the calendar.
stats: Dotmeet has over 4,000 users, with more than 1,500 daily active users, and serves over 1,000 events.

name: Momint
description: Momint enables fractional trade of renewable energy projects through its Asset Marketplace.
stats: 53k Users  |  $5.9M Assets  |  500k+ transactions

description: I don't want to edit the showcase. The data on the portal about Juno are up-to-date. Just feeling the form as it is mandatory to do so.

name: ICP Subaccount Indexer (ICSI)
description: The ICP Sub-Account Indexer is a tool designed to manage and track ICP sub-accounts on the Internet Computer, providing robust features for subaccount management, transaction tracking, and fund sweeping.
stats: Run a user specific deposit address on-chain infrastructure for less than 10 USD per month in cycles.

name: TezSign
description: TezSign is a digital signing platform that offers a seamless signing experience for individuals and enterprises. It utilizes blockchain to ensure the authenticity and immutability of document signing activities and leverages generative AI to streamline legal contract drafting.

name: Syron USD (SUSD)
description: A USD-pegged stablecoin, overcollateralized with Bitcoin and powered by Chain Fusion. It's open source and Bitcoin-native as a BRC-20 token, offering greater interoperability, stability, security, and decentralization. It boasts a permissionless design, allowing any Bitcoin wallet to create a Safety Deposit ₿ox to deposit BTC and withdraw SUSD.
stats:
Waitlist Signups: Nearly 2,000 users
Unique Visitors: Over 6,000 unique visitors to our app in the last month

name: Meddle
description: Meddle is a software-IoT product that deals with data collection from sensors and industrial machinery, aggregation of data from different industrial communication protocols normalization of ingested data, and sending to third-party destinations through a set of web communication protocols, enabling monitoring and analysis of operation and production data of these assets. With its integration in the ICP ecosystem, the goal is to securely store data retrieved from industrial machinery/PLCs etc..

name: IC Side Services
description: We created an orchestrator canister which interacts with the Akash Network so that DAOs can deploy the services they depend upon and that are currently run on AWS. The orchestrator is used to receive the ICP payments from canisters who need a supporting instance and it takes care of launching the instance and running on it the code specified by the canister.

name: Doxa
description: Doxa is a multi-stablecoin plartform with the doxa dollar

name: DappRadar
description: DappRadar acts as a dapp discovery portal for blockchain users, provides insights for investors and analysts, and educates visitors about vital blockchain networks.

name: Staex VTS
description:
Vehicle Tracking System (VTS) - infrastructure to track and invoice vehicles.

The goal - trusted, transparent and automatic infrastructure to use, rent and track vehicles.
stats: We achieved: trusted agreements without third parties, transparent vehicle telemetry, honest and automatic invoice creation from trusted telemetry.

name: Idempotent Proxy
description: 💈 Reverse proxy server with build-in idempotency support written in Rust & Cloudflare Worker.

name: Relation
description: Relation is a social graph based Internet computer

name: RoloDEX
description: RoloDEX is a self-sovereign directory using ICP security, giving YOU control of your contact information. Users can configure a complete private directory listing, then choose exactly what they want to share with other users or groups. Now you can share sensitive information like your phone number with close friends, but not random social groups. And when you change your info, you don’t have to blast out updates; contacts with access will receive the new data automatically.

name: asset-app
description: uBin (formerly Asset App) allows you to seamlessly launch your own file storage smart contracts on the Internet Computer using only a wallet and interact with them via a file explorer in the browser.
stats: Early whitelist access reached it's 100 user goal. Original debut video received over 120k views within days.

name: CycleOps
description:
Proactive, automated, no-code canister management for the Internet Computer.

In less than 10 minutes, get set up with automated cycles top ups, canister monitoring, and email alerting for your application today.
stats: Over 450 canisters monitored.

name: EstateDAO
description: EstateDAO enables users to list their properties for tokenization. Investors can browse these listings, invest in properties, and earn returns on their investments seamlessly.

name: Panorama Block
description: Panorama Block provides real-time blockchain data, starting with Bitcoin. It displays block sizes, values, and transaction counts on an easy-to-use interface. Users can view detailed transaction and address info alongside a proprietary scorecard feature. The platform includes helpful graphs for deeper analysis, making it a trusted source of blockchain data across various ecosystems.

name: MotoDEX
description:
🏍 MotoDEX is a hyper-casual game, in which users participate in motorcycle races, 
develop their riders and improve high-speed tracks.
stats: UAW 70,53k per day totally

name: RentSpace
description: a crypto-friendly property rental platform
stats:
1. Received Developer’s grants from Dfinity Foundation and completed 2 Milestones. 
2. Integrated one of the largest booking aggregator and started a closed testing of the app in July.
3. Launched 4 NFT collections and built a prototype of the NFT staking platform.
4. Completed the acceleration program by 3x Capital, participated in 3 Hackathons.
5. Opened a legal entity and bank accounts in Europe.
6. Organised 2 events with ICP CC, started to built a community (8k followers across all platforms) and onboarded 120 ambassadors.
7. Built an MVP of NFT staking platform for RentSpace Villas.

name: CLP
description: CLP (Crato Liquidity Protocol) is a liquidity protocol and native stablecoin project on the ICP chain. It allows users to deposit assets, borrow stablecoins at zero interest, and use them in ICP ecosystem DAPPs or participate in liquidation pools to earn rewards.
stats: More than 5,000 independent accounts participated in the test, and nearly 500 opinions and suggestions were collected.

name: Metaviz
description: Metaviz is a visual project collaboration workspace. Good for making diagrams, project management, storing files and media.

name: AlpacaFi
description: Tools to bring ICP to everyone, such as AlpacaFi (CoinMarketCap for ICP tokens) and PacaBot (Telegram Trading Bot).
stats: 30-50k impressions per month on our iOS and Android apps.

name: Highfeast-Explorer/Foodfolio
description: Decentralized food knowledge base offering personalised, round-the-clock cooking assistance to users on a chat interface.

name: Azle Chain Fusion Starter
description: Starter template leveraging chain fusion technology to build EVM coprocessors on the Internet Computer Protocol
stats:
GIthub Stats:

- 3 stars
- 2 watching
- 1 fork

name: DooCoins
description: Reward your kids with DooCoins for their good behaviour, completing chores, and personal achievements. Teach financial literacy and organization skills.

name: Gate23
description: Gate23 is an advanced Point of Sale (POS) and business software designed specifically for the Food & Beverage (F&B), e-commerce and retail industries. It automates the data collection process. With Gate23, detailed line-item purchase information is automatically uploaded directly to users’ Bridge23 accounts, allowing them to organize and sell their data more efficiently. The decentralized platform also builds greater trust among all parties involved.
stats: alpha version, 2 type contracts

name: IC PayPortal
description: The IC-PayPortal Motoko is a library that provides developers with a set of functions for managing fiat payments on the Internet Computer Protocol (ICP). This module enables seamless integration of popular fiat gateways such as Stripe and Paypal into Motoko applications

name: InternetComputer DA
description: Using canisters and threshold signature to build a DA layer compatible with EigenDA, providing reliable and more cost-effective and secure DA infrastructure for Blockchains.
stats: In multiple storage tests, ICDA has demonstrated the ability to maintain excellent operation under prolonged storage stress. In several demo tests, it achieved over 1 hour of blob writing and storage with an upload bandwidth of 10M, as well as verifying the blob hash and generating confirmations for the blobs to provide a valid proof of storage on the blockchain.

name: Event Hub/Attention DAO
description: Event Hub Broadcaster is an event-driven system managed by Attention DAO for connecting Internet Computer Ecosystem projects.

name: Bridge 23
description:
Bridge 23 is a fully featured Data Marketplace running on Internet Computer blockchain where everyone can sell their data directly to merchants, companies and institutions.

“Your Data is Your Business!”™
stats: 5000+ waitlist, 100+ users, 4000+ tokenized products

name: Ice Cube
description:
An Open Source Social Network 100% On-Chain. 

You can post updates in a microblog format, featuring the latest popular content. Users can buy and trade shares of these posts, creating a tokenized model. Like a post? Own a share!

Creators can also set up private communities for exclusive content. Only those who hold shares in the creator's work can access these private spaces, effectively tokenizing the creator. Enjoy their private content? Own a share!

name: Moonshift
description: MoonShift is a gamified quest board where projects can create “Shifts” or marketing bounties for their community to collect. Completed and approved bounties are paid out in native tokens to users.

name: IcpKit.swift
description: A comprehensive iOS package for writing mobile applications that interact with the Internet Computer Protocol (ICP), written in Swift. IcpKit aims at facilitating the interaction between iOS apps and the ICP blockchain.
stats: IcpKit.swift is being used in production by iOS app 'Bity Wallet'

name: DeDa - Decentralised Data Marketplace
description: In AI and ML, obtaining high-quality datasets is critical but challenging, often being time-consuming, costly, and prone to data integrity issues. Transparency and fairness in compensating data contributors and validators are also lacking. DeDa addresses these challenges by creating a decentralised data marketplace on the Internet Computer (ICP), enabling seamless data exchange, ensuring quality, and providing fair compensation in a secure, transparent, and efficient ecosystem.

name: PlexiMail
description: PlexiMail, the end-to-end encrypted, ICP Canister based, trustless secure email service with metadata cloaking and workflow extension for electronic signature and notarization.

name: liquidify.us - P2P Lending platform
description: We began as a P2P lending project in a hackathon and won the ICP Hackathon, sparking our passion for ICP and securing a grant for development. Our team of three ICP developers from India refined our ideas into a better solution. With Liquidify.us, you can lend ckBTC for ICP NFTs, and borrowers repay with APY. Our roadmap includes adding ckETH and ckUSD. Our loyalty program lets users earn points, convertible to tokens during TGE, incentivizing early adoption. That’s how Liquidify.us was born.
stats: Onchain DeFi P2P Loan for NFT

name: ICSpore
description: A payment solution for automated purchases in the IC ecosystem that allows you to buy tokens using a DCA financial strategy.
stats: We created the first non-custodial solution for automated purchases in the IC

name: Nauts World
description: A digital/physical toy and game world where players collect, stake and wager characters native to the Nauts World Multiverse all supported by various game types and collector mechanics to allow players of all ages and genres to be part of Nauts World

name: Satoshi Notes
description: SatoshiNotes is the free note taking software that allows you to sell your valuable notes for Bitcoin, and also keeps your files secure in your PC or the blockchain.

name: Bridge 23
description: First party data marketplace running on ICP where everyone can sell their data directly to merchants, companies and institutions.
stats: same

name: IC GameKit Part One
description: The IC GameKit is a drop-in replacement for the standard go-to Web2 gaming services like Unity Gaming Services or AWS GameKit. By giving a game developer an off the shelf solution to many of the systems that are required by a modern game i.e. authentication, achievements, game saves, user specific game data, the barrier to entry for creating such rich gaming experiences is drastically reduced.

name: RentSpace
description: A property rental platform powered by blockchain technology: Tik-Tok style marketing, crypto payments and user rewards programs.

name: Cipher AI Vault
description: Cipher AI Vault is an Azle-based proof of concept designed with a strong emphasis on abstraction, seamlessly integrating in-memory VectorDB, in-memory LLM, secure asset storage, cycles-distro top-up, and ic-auth for authentication. This adaptability makes it well-suited for a wide range of AI-driven use cases. The project showcases the Internet Computer's potential for secure, sandboxed AI development, offering versatile tools for diverse applications.

name: Cero Trade - IREC trading system por LATAM
description: Cero Trade is a decentralized platform for trading, buying, and redeeming tokenized IRECs (renewable energy certificates). It features a marketplace where users can manage their assets, redeem certificates, and list them for sale. With real-time data from the I-TRACK (sandbox) API, traders can make informed decisions. The platform ensures transparency and security by integrating decentralized KYC and transaction management for a seamless experience.
stats: Functional MVP - to be approved by legal entities and audited by I-TRACK foundation

name: ToyoWorld
description: Collect, battle and track down mythical creatures in this open world adventure game!

name: File system implemented on top of the stable memory of the IC.
description:
The stable-fs  enables storing files on the stable memory of the Internet Computer, providing a 
persistent and fault-tolerant storage solution.
stats: * Writing and reading of 100 Mb of data on the mounted file within around  130 M instructions, * Inserting a million persons into a rusqlite database within about 9B instructions.

name: Civic Pass
description: Digital identity platform enabling developers to quickly leverage a variety of verification services and provide users with a reusable identity to more quickly onboard into new applications.
stats: 900,000 passes issued, millions of bots blocked

name: GRUNT defi
description: Tired of being right too soon? Lock your Bitcoins on grunt.defi and get rewarded for your convictions that stand the test of time. Grunt.defi — the unbribable consensus platform that seeks the truth.

name: plonk-verifier-on-icp
description:
We implement a gnark plonk verifier on ICP. 
Gnark is a well-known ZK scheme written by Go, its verifier can be exported as solidity only.
ICP does not support solidity smart contract natively, we implement the plonk verifier in rust and then deploy on ICP. 
Arkworks is a well-known ZK library written in Rust,  which does not support plonk,  but provides some basic ZK components, such as finite field, curve, paring。Hence, we plan to implement rust plonk verifier based on arkworks.

name: NeverEndsArt
description: Decentralized AI Video generation platform
stats: 200,00 users, 500,000 Videos generated

name: Chainsight
description: Chainsight is an advanced on-chain data hub that aggregates data from various markets and makes it accessible on-chain. Any data can be accessed from smart contracts, including data that can be retrieved from HTTPS endpoints on the web, results calculated from huge amounts of data, and states from other chains.

name: Game Bloc
description: GameBloc is a decentralized platform that lets gamers and gaming organizations create and join game tournaments. It offers both crowdfunded and prepaid tournaments, ensuring fair rewards through blockchain technology. With features like customizable tournaments, secure transactions, and transparent competition, GameBloc brings a new level of trust and engagement to gaming.
stats:
Over 700 active users on the platform.
More than 1000 followers on Twitter, 150 subscribers on Youtube.
Successful launch of the Blitzkrieg tournament, with high user engagement and follow-up tournaments.
Over $2000 in transaction volume generated from tournament activities.
Partnership with Nexal, expanding our network.
Automated payments and smart contract integration ensuring secure prize distribution across tournaments.

name: ICPEx
description: ICPEx is a full-chain decentralized exchange powered by the Proactive Market Maker (PMM) algorithm and is committed to becoming a decentralized financial hub serving Web3.
stats: ICPEx is the first DEX in the ICP ecosystem to complete integration with DexScreener. Currently, users have created over 600 tokens on ICPEx, making it the largest memecoin creation platform in the ICP ecosystem.

name: icRamp
description: icRamp is a decentralized protocol that seamlessly integrates the Internet Computer with Ethereum and other blockchains, enabling fast, trustless onramping and offramping of digital assets.

name: User Public Achievement Standard (UPAS)
description: UPAS is a Decentralized Open-source Reputation Standard that utilizes Internet Computer canisters to securely and autonomously verify user achievements, issuing credentials without relying on centralized authorities. This approach enhances trust, security, and user control in digital identity management, bridging the gap between users, issuers, and verifiers in the digital economy.

name: ICSoccerWorld

App to crowdfund open-source

Request software you need and share the costs with others

- Describe your problem
- Find like-minded people to help fund it.

SOLUTIO makes open source profitable and affordable!

name: Piggycell
description:
Piggycell is a DEPIN project that provides tokenized incentive solutions to electric power charging platforms.
Piggycell has deployed 100,000 Chargers to over 13,000 POI (Point of Installation) and successfully marked as no.1 charging infrastructures in South Korea.
We currently have over 3 million users with 90% market share across the country and
our mission is to successfully bring web2 users to web3 world by providing seamless web3 experiences
stats: 3,210,000 users. 100,000 Batteries over 13,000 Devices Deployed

name: IC Push Metrics
description: Our project aims to address these limitations by modifying the IC node source code to allow nodes to push metrics. This eliminates the need for firewall reconfiguration and external IP management, providing a more secure and streamlined method for accessing node metrics.
stats: The product is a demo at the moment

name: CLP
description: CLP is an omni-chain liquidity protocol and native stablecoin platform within the ICP ecosystem. Through an interest-free lending mechanism, CLP aims to provide users with low-cost, efficient, and secure crypto asset lending services across all assets. Users can pledge ICP, BTC, ETH, or other supported assets to borrow the stablecoin CUSD, achieving crypto asset liquidity, and earn additional mining and liquidation rewards through a dual-token mechanism (stablecoin CUSD and platform token CLPT).

llama.cpp on the Internet Computer - fully on-chain, no outcalls.

https://icgpt.icpp.world

Our platform transforms how organizations access and implement AI, all powered by ICP's robust infrastructure.

Manage internet computer projects, canisters, and cycles with ease using our intuitive GUI

- Unified Project Management

- Effortless Canister Control

- Simplified Identity Management

- Monitor cycle balances, convert ICP to cycles, and top up canisters directly from the dashboard.

- Visual Network Configuration

- Comprehensive Logging

name: CLOAD
description:
Web3 applications and game marketplaces, you can fully deploy your project on the blockchain.
CLOAD is a decentralized WEB3.0 virtual goods trading platform built on the Internet computer network. It aims to provide users with a rich experience in creation and transactions. On CLOAD, you can freely submit and share your creations, whether they are artworks, videos, games, applications, or other virtual goods. They can be showcased and traded on the platform.
stats: More than 2000 registered users，Theoretically, there is no upper limit on the file hosting capacity. Currently, more than 10TB of project hosting and storage are possible.

name: Tap Protocol
description: Tap is the most programmable layer 1 Bitcoin protocol, which enables full smart-contract functionality (AMMs for example) without having to wrap or bridge any assets, and without the need for any L2 infrastructure.
stats: First Bitcoin native smart contracts (L1). First Bitcoin protocol to achieve full AMMs and decentralised peer-to-peer swaps ('Uniswap of Bitcoin'). First protocol to build L1 Bitcoin<> L1 Ethereum Bridge. First Bitcoin protocol to enable stablecoins (USDT, USDC,etc) directly on L1 Bitcoin. First Bitcoin token to launch with Coinlist.

id: Shipstone VetKey Cargo Crate and NPM Package
name: VetKey Cargo Crate and NPM Package
description: Shipstone developed a Rust-based cargo crate and an NPM package to simplify access to VetKeys functionality, enabling developers to use VetKeys without low-level coding expertise.  A demo app is linked to in the repo that shows how the tools programmatically share the content with others securely.  According to ICP, VetKey functionality will be released around the end of Q1 2025.
logo: /img/showcase/shipstone vetkey cargo crate and npm package_logo_attuffahlyngbfvwl.png
stats: We created deliverables that will enable other developers to reliably use a complex functionality soon to be released by ICP.

name: Tally Bot
description: This app by the CodeGov team can query the governance canister of the NNS and update a custom list of neuron IDs regarding their vote status of a proposal. Known neurons can make their voting more transparent than it is today with other tools. This bot is deployed for OpenChat community channels and it will operate in threads of messages that are in channels already dedicated to NNS proposals. It is open sourced so anyone can modify the bot for their own use.

name: Chain Fusion Governance Module (CGM)
description:
DAOs on Q can use Chain Fusion to operate across chains, starting with the management of cross-chain treasuries. CGM augmented treasuries can live on ICP or on any EVM chain like Ethereum or L2's like Arbitrum, Polygon and Optimism. 

Furthermore, the CGM can be modified to govern any other smart contract or canister. An expansion to non-EVM chains, including Bitcoin is planned. More information can be found [in the docs](https://docs.q-dao.tools/category/chain-fusion-governance-modules-cgm).

name: DeDa : Decentralised Data Application
description: Imagine you're an AIML researcher trying to train a model, but you can't find the right data or it's too expensive and unreliable. At the same time, people with valuable data don't know how to share it securely. That’s where DeDa comes in. DeDa is a decentralised marketplace built on the Internet Computer where researchers can request data and data owners can share it with the researchers. It’s like a trusted, automated system for sharing data in a secure, transparent, and efficient manner.
stats: Not there yet!

name: SYRON USD
description: SYRON USD is a BTC-backed stablecoin that provides USD-denominated loans using BTC as collateral. Users deposit BTC into independent Safety Deposit Boxes (SDBs)—trustless, smart contract vaults linked to their Bitcoin self-custodial wallets—to receive SYRON loans. It's an open-source system that ensures transparency, decentralization, and capital efficiency to access liquidity for payments and DeFi. Built on BTC and ICP, SYRON combines scalability and cybersecurity to redefine digital dollars.

name: Univoice
description: Univoice is the first Ai Agent+depin project in the Internet Computer ecosystem based on voice multi-modal data. We combine it with IC’s advanced encryption and computing technology to ensure the security and ownership of user data. Through interactive training between voice and AI Agent, users can have their own ai Agent, implements voice2earn.

name: Diode Collab
description: Diode Collab is a decentralized full self-custody alternative for discord/slack/ms teams. It also allows sharing of files and folders, keeping notes and managing shared network resource access making it a viable alternative for small and medium businesses to run their communication at low cost with maximum security. Often businesses can fold the old cost for slack, vpn and external storage together and go safer and cheaper with Diode Collab.
stats: We just finished integration and are launching full ICP support this month.
